reviews.comments:
el loft de los chicos es impecable, puesto con gusto y calidez! Todo funciona y de haber un problema , inmediatamente lo estan solucionando!!
Bien ubicado respecto del centro de mendoza, barrio tranquilo y lindo!! Deje el auto en la puerta todos los dias y todo perfecto.
Wifi funciono muy bien, la cocina equipada y funciional y hasta con lavarropas cuenta!!
Hay detalles como la heladera para vinos con una selecta busqueda para que (de haberte faltado uno!!) lo tengas a mano. Buen punto!!!
Gracias chicos, nos vemos el año que viene!!
laura
Gran loft. Práctico, impecable. Lindo. Fotos reales. Voy a volver seguramente el año que viene.
Es muy moderno y completo. Cerca de la zona de restaurantes , súper seguro para recorrer el barrio caminando . Para volver a elegir!! Los anfitriones se portaron genial!!
Un lugar armonioso, limpio super confortable.. nos hicieron sentir como en casa!! Realmente una maravilla!!
Excelente del depto y la atención!
Excelente!!
Hermoso el departamento con toda la comodidad necesaria.. Muy lindo fin de semana gracias Geraldine por tu amabilidad.. Nos vemos pronto.
Precioso y espacioso el loft, todo como se muestra en las fotos! Muy buena ubicación (cerca de Arístides Villanueva como para manejarse a pie), y Geraldine siempre atenta. Lo recomiendo!

Genial! Tanto el loft como la atención de Geraldine fueron de primera. Muy cómodo el sistema digital de apertura de la puerta para facilitar la llegada y la salida. Totalmente recomendable. Muchas gracias por todo!

Excelente estadía! El departamento tiene todo lo que esta publicado y más. Geraldine y Guillermo muy predispuestos, ademas de ser claros con las instructivas del departamento y evacuar inquietudes respecto al mismo, son todos unos guías turísticos! Están en todos los detalles, muy recomendable!

La estadia fue excelente. El departamento es divino, esta perfectamente equipado, muy comodo y practico. Geraldine fue una anfitriona fantastica y nos asistio en todo momento. Definitivamente volveremos a alojarnos aqui en nuestra proxima visita a Mendoza

La ubicación ha sido muy buena y el departamento es tal cual se muestra en las fotos. Chiquito pero con TODO lo que se necesita para tener una excelente estadía. Es moderno y los anfitriones son excelentes. Sumamente atentos y voluntariosos para lo que necesites. MUY RECOMENDABLE!

El loft es muy lindo, en especial la cocina que es amplia y luminosa. El barrio es tranquilo. Lo que fue muy incómodo es que en el dormitorio las cortinas son casi transparentes y no tiene persiana, por lo cual apenas amanece entra mucha luz y eso nos impidió descansar bien.
reviews.response:
Hola Alma! Nos alegra les haya gustado el loft y que la pasaran bien! 
Vamos a tener en cuenta lo de las cortinas, gracias por tu sugerencia. 
Saludos!

reviews.comments: De mas estaría reiterar la evaluación otorgada en la anterior experiencia en el Loft de Geraldine!. Solo dejar en claro que fue una estadía super grata y la atención de Geraldine y su padre, simplemente excelente! Muchas gracias!

Apenas llegamos al loft, nos dimos cuenta que íbamos a tener unas vacaciones muy cálidas, no solo por lo hermoso y equipado del mismo, sino también por los "tips" que nos había dejado Geraldine y el muy cordial recibimiento de su padre. Cabe destacar la tranquilidad del barrio, cerca de los mejores bares y restaurantes de mendoza y a su vez, no tanto del bullicio de las calles principales. Ideal para descansar y ni pensar donde dejar el auto, ya que en la misma calle se podía hacer sin tener miedo que pasara algo. Geraldine estuvo en todo momento en contacto con nosotros y si teniamos alguna consulta o inquietud, siempre estaba ahi!. Tuvimos un imprevisto a la hora de irnos hacia Chile, ya que, por una interminable tormenta de nieve, el cruce permaneció cerrado 6 días, y en un momento de mucha preocupación para nosotros, tuvimos una respuesta muy agradable y reparadora por parte de ella al generarnos una nueva reserva. Lamentablemente no pudimos conocernos personalmente, (no creo falte oportunidad) ya que ella estaba del otro lado de la cordillera "sufriendo" lo mismo que nosotros a la hora de intentar cruzar. Algunos puntos a destacar del loft serian, que es bien amplio y equipado, muy buena señal de wi-fi, excelente ubicación para descansar y muy moderno. Muchas gracias por todo y seguro volveremos!
Excelente Loft y hospitalidad de Geraldine y Guillermo. Muchas gracias por todo. Saludos

Geraldine ha sido magnífica desde el momento en que me entregó las llaves, el loft es bellísimo,  cómodamente ubicado en un lugar absolutamente extrategico y accesible a todo. Estamos totalmente satisfechos, superó  nuestra expectativa, nada mejor que estar fuera de casa y sentirse como en casa, así  fue. Muchas gracias !!!

Excelente el loft, la verdad es igual a las fotos. Geraldine y Guillermo nos recibieron muy bien brindándonos información y muy buenas recomendaciones sobre lugares para comer y conocer. Fueron muy atentos durante toda nuestra estadía.
El loft es impecable super limpio, todo en el es muy lindo y esta nuevo. Nos sentimos muy cómodos y a gusto. El barrio esta en una muy buena ubicación, cerca de todo. Dejamos todas las noches el auto sobre la calle y no tuvimos ningún problema.
Mis mejores recomendaciones para el loft y sus anfitriones. Muchas gracias y esperamos volver! Abrazos.
Es un Loft Hermoso, la zona en la que se encuentra es segura y central, y la caba de vinos está increíble y muy barata.

Muy bonito Loft. Tal cual se puede ver en las fotos. Lo pasamos genial. Muchas gracias a Geraldine, muy atenta y detallista. 
Recomendado al 100%.

Ubicación agradable, apartamentos simpático, tranquilo y bien amueblado, con todas las comodidades para nuestras necesidades (dos perosnas). Valiosa ayuda de Geraldine con recomendaciones para paseos, lugares a visitar, restaurantes, facilidad en check in y check out.

No veo ningún area de oportunidad para mejorar, el loft se encuentra en excelente ubicación sus instalaciones son muy completas y cuenta con más de lo necesario para hacer de tu estadía una excelente experiencia.
Geraldine y su esposo son unos excelentes anfitriones me sentí como en casa muy recomendado!

Geraldine nos recibió muy amorosamente, nos tenía preparado un mapa de la ciudad con todas las posibilidades para actividades turísticas y gastronómicas. 
La casa es acogedora y luminosa, perfecta para un fin de semana tranquilo. Además está cerca de lugares de interés a los que se puede llegar caminando, como el Parque o el sector de restaurantes.
Lo pasamos muy bien y nos sentimos como en casa.

Todo estuvo perfecto! El lugar es tal cual como dice el anuncio y se ve en las fotos, súper cómodo, la ubicación excelente, el barrio tranquilo. El departamento estaba impecable, tiene de todo, es amplio... mucho mejor que ir a un hotel. Geraldine fue muy amable, estaba muy pendiente de que todo estuviera bien, nos dió muchos datos de cosas que hacer. El celular además ayuda a poder comunicarte con ella por cualquier cosa. En fin, todo excelente. Muchas gracias!

realmente fue excelente nuestra estadia en el loft, Geraldine nos esperaba cuando llegamos con su marido muy amables super atentos,simpaticos, buenos amfitriones,  el loft super lindo limpio muy confortable, la localidad muy buena, el ambiente super lindo. Difinitivamente  lo recomiendo de primer nivel.Gracias Chicos.
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias Clidia y Charles! Para nosotros fue un placer recibirlos! Nos alegra mucho hayan tenido una buena estadia y esperamos recibirlos nuevamente. Ustedes son unos huespedes super recomendables, dejaron el departamento como lo entregamos.
Un gran abrazo!

reviews.comments: Our stay at Geraldine's loft was unforgettable. Even though we didn't have the chance to meet her, we were received by her father, Alberto, who showed the place and gave us very useful advice. The place was extremely clean and fully equipped. The neighborhood was safe and quiet, very close to some nice restaurants and bars. Geraldine was always in touch with us, checking if we needed anything and her advice was very helpful. We felt like home since we arrived and we didn't want to leave!

I rented Geraldine's loft for my parents in law who spent 2 weeks in Mendoza. Geraldine was a wonderful host. Her apartment was sparkling clean, well appointed and cozy. Geraldine was easy to communicate with, fast to reply and when my in laws had some trouble with the Wi-Fi, Geraldine immediately had the cable company come in to fix the issue. She also booked some winery tours for them which was such a nice and friendly touch. Thank you, Geraldine and see you again soon!

This points were perfect:
- Check In
- Apartment 
- Communications with Geraldine 
- The offert Wine
- everything!!!!!
Geraldine is a helpful Host, Thank you very much!!!
Tudo ótimo.. me senti em casa

This place is an absolute gem. Quiet, close to everything and tasteful. Geraldine was amazing, let us check in early after a loooong bus ride from Bariloche (don’t do it, fyi) and was so helpful with local insight, resto tips and even helped us get a cab at 5am! She even met us to welcome us with a bottle of wine.

Superhost does not say enough about Geraldine and this place was the best Airbnb theater we found in our 2 weeks in Argentina!
Great place to stay in Mendoza. Exceptional value.
Great Location, Great Value, Great Hosts
Apartment very pleasant, well located. Geraldine is charming and accessible. TY Geraldine !

Had a fantastic stay at Geraldine’s loft. Great location, walking distance to the main restaurants and bars. Loft was spacious and had everything we needed. Geraldine was a fabulous host with great communication both prior to our arrival and during our stay. Would highly recommend staying here while in Mendoza!
Great location and quiet place.

Fantastic base whilst in Mendoza. The best host we had for our whole 3 week trip. Easy check in with electronic door - Geraldine accommodated our early arrival which was bliss after a 20 hr bus journey. Short walk to lots of bars and restaurants but still quiet enough at night. The level of information, communication and the personal little touches was unparalled. Would thoroughly recommend.
reviews.response: Thanks Andy for such a nice review!

reviews.comments:
Geraldine’s space was beautiful, comfortable and had everything we needed for our short stay. We were within walking distance to large park and the Main Street with lots of places to eat/drink. She was very accommodating to our schedule and left us a great bottle of wine!
Thank you!

A casa é exatamente como nas fotos. Muito aconchegante, limpa e agradável. O único ponto é a localização, pois não fica tão perto das ruas de restaurantes e bares. Mas   é possível caminhar até elas...
Our stay was perfect, we enjoyed the appartement really well localised, beautiful and commode. Thanks again to Geraldine and Guillermo and for their kindness. We will come back !

Though I didnt get to meet Geraldine, communication was excellent and check-in and check out was a smooth stress-free process. She even ordered a cab to take us to the airport super early and they picked us up right in the for. If I return to Mendoza I will definitely stay here again.

Geraldine's place is amazing as is she. Although we never actually met her she was great with communication and gave a huge list of suggested activities to do in and around the area.  

The loft itself is perfect. It has everything you need for a stay including a brilliant honesty fridge stocked with wine. 

One of, if not the best all around Airbnb experience we've had.

Apartamento com ótima localização. A 7 quadras do parque San Martin e próxima a Av Aristides Villaneuva onde se concentra bons restaurantes e bares. Região super residencial, silenciosa e segura. Apartamento próprio para jovens casais. Estacionamento na rua com várias opções de vagas. Cozinha bem equipada, com máquina de lavar. Geraldine abastece o apartamento com várias dicas atualizadas do que fazer
Em Mendoza. É uma ótima anfitriã.

Minha experiencia ao hospedar no apartamento da Geraldine foi muito boa e gratificante. Geraldine é uma excelente anfitriã.
O local é muito bom e perto de tudo. Ótimos bares e restaurantes.

O apartamento é uma graça, assim como nas fotos,a anfitriã é ótima,sempre solicita e prestativa, e a localização é boa; está aproximadamente, a  1 km de bares e restaurantes.O apartamento é silencioso,cama boa e cozinha equipada.Nosso único senão, é o fato do banheiro ficar no piso de baixo,mas nada que pudesse atrapalhar a estadia.Recomendo.

Geraldine's loft was wonderful. She was very easy to communicate with and the place was clean and close to everything. She made us feel very welcome. She even left us a bottle of wine! Very thoughtful!

O loft da Geraldine foi ótimo. A comunicação com ela foi bem facile e o apartamento foi limpo e num lugar bem próximo para tudo. A gente sentiu muito bem vindo...ela deixou uma garrafa de vinho pra a gente! Muito simpática!

We spent 3 days  at the flat and it was so great! The apt looks just like the pictures and was very clean and nice. Geraldine is very kindly and courteous, always available. The apt has a lot of details, that Geraldine prepared to us and we loved! If you look for a nice place to stay and spend you vacations, this one is very indicated!

Gerldine's loft is beautiful, cozy, immaculately clean, and has everything you may need for a great stay in Mendoza. Geraldine was also a phenomenal host, accommodating our request to let us leave our bags several hours after the check out. When we returned to pick up our bags, she was there because she didn't want to leave our belongings alone with the cleaning lady who she didn't know as well. She even called a car for us to the airport, there wasn't anything she didn't think of

Apartamento bem localizado, limpo, com varias comodidades proximas, como kioscos, cafés e restaurantes. Também possui ponto de onibus próximo ao local. A Anfitriã é atenciosa e sempre responde rapido pelo whatssap. Recomendamos.

Foi uma semana incrível, gostamos muito de Mendoza. Fizemos muitos passeios interessantes. O apartamento é agradável, bem localizado, silencioso e confortável. Geraldine foi uma excelente anfitriã. Nos sentimos extremamente bem acolhidos. A atenção a nós dispensada superou nossas expectativas. Recomendamos com certeza o Loft.

The stay at Geraldines apartment was fantastic! The apartment itself was as beautiful as described and shown in the pictures. Also the communication with her was easy and super fast. She gave us a lot of information what to do in Mendoza and also stayed in touch with us over our stay. We wanted to go to Santiago but our Bus was cancelled so we needed to stay for one more night in Mendoza. Geraldine directly got in touch with us and offered us another night at her apartment when she heard that our bus was cancelled. This place is totally to recommend if you want a great stay in Mendoza! The apartment was beautiful and we felt taken care of with all the great information about Mendoza.

Thank you for everything!
Really amazing place and incredible service. I'll be back for sure! Thanks for a great experience!
reviews.response: Thanks Dylan!! It was a pleasure to receive you at the apartment. You are a fabulous guest! Always welcome!

reviews.comments: Great host, fantastic location close to great restaurants. We were able to walk everywhere. Fantastic base in Mendoza city.

Ficar nesta casa foi uma escolha muito boa.
Ótima localização.
Pouco barulho.
Região tranquila e perto de tudo.
A casa em si, embora pequena, tinha todas as condições para uma boa estadia.

Geraldine foi atenciosa e solícita sempre que requisitada.

Gostamos muito!!!!!

Andiara

The Loft is a wonderful haven! Geraldine is a perfect host. She kept in close contact with us to answer our questions, as well as offered very helpful suggestions for activities and dining in the area. She was so thoughtful.  Easy access was provided to the well appointed apartment with its well-equipped kitchen, relaxing living area, and comfortable loft bedroom. We thoroughly enjoyed our days & stay here.
Great location for walking to the lively area of Ave. Villanueva with its hip beer bars, restaurants, and shops. Parque San Martin and the lake is not far. The Micro Center of Mendoza is a twenty minute walk, full of upscale stores, parks, cafes and museums. Yet, the Loft itself is in a nice, quiet, neighborhood street. We would definitely stay here again. Perfect!

Geraldine was a very gracious host. She anticipated things that would be helpful and assisted us in setting them up. Easy to communicate with and really made you feel at home.

The loft is fantastic with an extremely comfortable bed and an easy 10 minute walk to all of the restaurants and places of the city.

We were greeted with a bottle of wine and can speak very highly to all of their recommendations.

We loved staying at Geraldine's place, it was a real home from home. Geraldine gave us lots of tips and recommendations before our arrival, we especially loved the honesty wine cooler, a special touch.

Thanks so much Geraldine! For the wonderful wine, the wonderful and easy communication. We loved this home and it was exactly what we needed. We utilized the mini cellar making it easy not to even leave the house! She put so much into her recommendations and advice. Couldn't have asked for a better host. Thanks again. Eva and Blake

Geraldine's place is truly a gem! Modern yet still cozy.  We have stayed in a lot of airbnb's and I must say Geraldine and her Husband go way above and beyond for their guest.  I can't say enough about how helpful they were and welcoming.  
-good sized kitchen with everything you might need for a short or long stay
-good location (quite yet close to everything you may need)
-comfortable bed with good quality linens
-amazing communication
-washing machine
Thanks for a wonderful time in Mendoza!

This loft was wonderful! A short walk to San Martin park made for the perfect day. I stayed here while traveling for business and the modern apartment was the perfect place to get work done while being comfortable in my stay. Geraldine was absolutely wonderful and gave me a plethora of advice for things to do in the city, local grocery stores/restaurants, and booking my transport. I would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a quiet, well-located stay in Mendoza.

This was a fabulous base for two to explore Mendoza. The apartment was very comfortable with a great location, easily walkable to restaurants, bars, parks, and supermarket. Neighborhood was residential and felt very safe. Geraldine was an amazing and responsive host who reached out to us affirmatively when it looked like our flight was getting cancelled to make sure we had alternative arrangements and a place to stay.  And she had a lovely bottle of wine waiting for us when we arrived.

My husband and I loved everything about Geraldine's place (communication, recommendations, apartment design, amenities, bars/restaurants, parks, and more) 

We felt very welcomed booking with Geraldine. From the time we booked the place, 3 months prior, to check out. She provided lots of information on what to do while in Mendoza. Truly a very pleasurable experience. 

The area around the place is lively. A few blocks away there are many bars/restaurants. We experienced St. Patty's day in Mendoza! We always felt safe walking around. 

I highly recommend stay here!

*pro tip: at the supermarket, if you buy produce, someone has to weigh and tag before check-out.

Geraldine's place was perfect for us and a wonderful refuge after so many weeks of travelling. The kitchen was very complete. There was coffee, spices and paper towels. There was a washing machine with a spinner  and a drying rack. The area was spacious and clean with reliable wifi and two air conditioners, one on the upper and one on the lower level. Before we arrived we mentioned to Geraldine that we were interested in going to the Mendoza wine festival. Her husband waited in line for us for 3 hours to get us a ticket!! They also left us a bottle of lovely red wine and fruit and a list of best places to visit. Geraldine and her husband are kind, and generous hosts that truly care about their guests and their experience in Mendoza. Highly recommend!
A Geraldine é uma excelente anfitriã! Super atenciosa e receptiva! Nos recebeu com frutas, vinho e recadinhos!!! A casa é sensacional! Super bem decorada e aconchegante! Teve tudo que precisamos!
Geraldine was fantastic!

We loved this apartment and Geraldine was simply amazing.  We had a 5 star experience! The apartment is on a quiet street but a very short walk to some great bars and restaurants.  Mendoza is a very walkable city!  Geraldine was so responsive and helped us a lot.  She gave us some great advice on things to do and even printed out some bus tickets for us!  When we arrived she had a beautiful bottle of Malbec and a bowl of fresh fruit waiting for us.  The apartment is clean, well equipped and the bed was very comfortable.  We have stayed in a lot of Airbnb's and we would highly recommend Geraldine's apartment in Mendoza.

Easy check-in and check-out; Geraldine gave us a lot of usefull information, for which we where really thankfull. We felt very comfortable in the apartment. Geraldine always responded very quickly to our queries.

Geraldine was a great host, full of good energy, ensuring we were comfortable and was quick to reply to any of our queries. Her loft is well located for exploring Mendoza, as well as making day trips out to the different wine regions. We took up a number of Geraldine's recommendations which contributed to a memorable stay in Mendoza. We look forward to coming back. Michael & Barbara.
Geraldine was easily contactable and helped us with our every need. The loft was great exactly how the pictures show.

Lovely spacious apartment in a residential area of the city. About a 5 minute walk to Aristides, a street full of bars, restaurants and shops. A further 10 minutes into the city centre.
Our stay was excellent, Geraldine and her husband were extremely helpful during all our stay. The apartment is big, airy and light, it has all the amenities needed.
Highly recommended!

Quiet neighborhood. We drove everywhere as we had a car. The apartment was clean, tastefully decorated and equipped with all we needed. Nice bottle of wine and fruit bowl left for us from the host who was very helpful and speaks English perfectly.

Geraldines loft is stylish and spacious and offers full facilities for a travelling couple. We walked to the nearby restaurant/bar district each evening and whilst it is a bit more of a hike, we walked into the town centre.
The apartment was quiet and well furnished. We would recommend pre-booking a wine tour before arrival in Mendoza. We did a full day guided cycle tour which whilst great. We didn't actually meet Geraldine but felt we got personal service thru the notes left and wine and fruit that were left for our arrival, and the assistance we got with booking a taxi to the airport on departure.
Thanks for a wonderful stay.

Would recommend! Place is very nice and Geraldine makes it so easy! Looks just like pictures and is about 10-15 min walk from a lot of restaurants. It's easy in Mendoza to call cabs to take you to wineries or other attractions.

Geraldine is a fantastic host. She saved our Christmas by pre-booking a great Christmas dinner for us at a closed door restaurant and sorting out an emergency dental appointment. We couldn't have done either of these without her kindness and help. Even before we arrived, Geraldine was in contact with clear, concise information about the loft, local restaurants and the best wine routes.

The loft is just as described and perfectly located for enjoying the best of Mendoza.  Geraldine's knowledge and passion for the city and Argentina made our stay really memorable!

Zum Loft: Mit allem (und mehr) Notwendigem ausgestattet, komfortabel und chic. Besonders schätzte ich die gut ausgestattete Küche, die Waschmaschine, die schöne und zweckmässige Möbelausstattung, das einwandfreie Bad und das gut funktionierende WLAN. Die loftartigen zwei Geschosse haben viel Charme. Die Wohnung ist sehr gut und zentral gelegen, die Lage ausgesprochen sicher. Die meisten Sehenswürdigkeiten in Mendoza (Parque General San Martin, Aristides, die Plazas etc.) sind fussläufig wunderbar erreichbar. Insgesamt und zusammengefasst: ausgesprochen stimmig!

Zu den Hosts: Geraldine und Guillermo haben meinen Aufenthalt zu einem unvergesslichen Erlebnis gemacht. Ihre Gastfreundschaft, die Unterstützung und Hilfsbereitschaft, lassen sich in Worten kaum beschreiben. Bei meiner Ankunft (zu später Stunde) stand ein Früchteteller und etwas zum Essen bereit, zwei Flaschen Wein hiessen mich willkommen. Die beiden halfen mir in jeder Situation weiter (Touren organisieren, Ausgehtipps, Taxi bestellen undundund). Insgesamt und zusammengefasst: Für die beiden reichen 5 Sterne nicht aus, Prädikat sensationell!

Alles in allem eine wunderbare Erfahrung und ein absoluter 'Daumenhoch'-Tipp. Wärmstens empfohlen!

Beautiful loft and amazing host.  Geraldine was really helpful with all organizational pieces.  The only negative was the unreliable wifi.  When you're traveling, you definitely cannot rely on it in the first place, but it'd cut out every few minutes consistently. Still, highly recommend.
reviews.response:
It's the first time we have a complaint with wifi. Next time please let your hosts know so that we can solve it,  we are always in constant comunication and available to assist you. Otherwise we are not able to be aware you are not satisfied. :)
Thanks for coming!

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed our stay in Geraldines loft in Mendoza. Very well located in vicinity of main strolls of the city. Easy to park the car. All nice and clean. Very good hospitality. Highly recomendable.
Great place for a couple to spend time in Mendoza.. close to park, and easy walk to city centre..

Geraldine was by far a SUPER HOST! She went out of her way to make us welcome and even helped me out when I made an error with the dates I booked! The apartment was spacious and clean with a great bottle of wine as a treat (wish I had bought a South African bottle to leave in return). Easy to access, nice area. Highly recommended

Great experience, the loft is modern and well located. Geraldine was travelling at the time we checked in however left a detailed check-in details and followed up with us throughout our stay too.

We were catching late bus put of Mendoza and she went out of her way to help organise for our luggage to be stored with a family member after we checked out and ordered a taxi to pick us up.

Would not hesitate to stay here again if we go back to Mendoza.
Thank you Geraldine for being such a wonderful hostess! She was easily accessible at all times for any questions and was helpful in making sure we had a good time! Thanks again!

My stay at the loft was great. I was initially worried that the location was a bit far, but it's perfect- very well located for restaurants, etc. The pictures are accurate, and the loft was clean. The wifi was reliable. Also, Geraldine made getting into/leaving the loft very easy, provided a lot of great wine tour/restaurant recommendations, and even ordered a taxi for me when I was leaving, rather than me having to worry about it- what a great host!

great stay in mendoza, Geraldine was very welcoming and always within contact to make sure we had everything we needed. Loft was very suitable to what we needed and spent a really good 4 nights there. was a very nice walk into mendoza city centre too. thanks again Geraldine.

Geraldine was a great host and her place is so lovely and comfortable. She was so helping in every request that we did. We enjoyed staying at her place and if we visit mendoza again I would like to stay at her place again!

This was maybe the best AirBnB experience I've ever had. Before I arrived Geraldine sent me a massive list of things to do in the area with all kinds of tips on how to get around. When I arrived there was a (terrific) bottle of wine waiting for me in the loft--which, by the way, is absolutely gorgeous and incredibly comfortable. I had a such a great time in Mendoza that I opted to stay an extra day; when I asked Geraldine if that was ok she immediately said yes and took care of everything required with AirBnB, leaving me with no extra work at all. She even followed up with me every day of my stay to see how I was doing and if I needed anything and offered to call me a car to the airport the day I left. If you're visiting Mendoza it should be illegal to stay anywhere but here.

Geraldine and Guillermo have by far been the best hosts throughout our travels in Argentina and Chile (4 Airbnb stays so far).  They are wonderfully accommodating, helping us wherever we needed, recommending some great restaurants and tours, and even booking our bus and taxi for our travel to Chile.   The loft is as pictured, beautiful and impressive.   We were very happy to be able to cook our own meals during our stay and wash our cloths!   The guest booklet is a great idea and helped us to read tips about the city for our stay.   Thank you guys for making our Mendoza experience amazing!

We loved our stay! The loft is spacious, clean, and comfortable! Great wifi, tv, kitchen, and best of all washing machine! Geraldine and her husband were so easy to get in touch with, and very responsive if any issues came up. Only thing to note is it's a double bed, not queen but super comfortable!

Geraldine and Guillermo did more than everything for us to feel like home.  The apartment is well located with all the necessary amenities.  Their hints were useful, we will highly recommend this place.

Perfect!!! 
Geraldine & Guillermo did welcome us at this beautiful place very lovely and friendly!!!
They even had tee and coffee, with fruits ready. We felt at home from the first till the last second! They always helped us when we needed something or with tours in Mendoza!
The apartment was very clean, well located and fully equipped. The perfect place to spend some days in Mendoza!!!
Thank you so much!!! 

Stefanie & Marco

This place is awesome! And Geraldine did a great job making us feel welcome. First off, she left great and clear instructions for our arrival and entrance into the loft. Next, she left an entire booklet with details on amazing experiences in Mendoza. 

The Location - This place is in a fantastic location of Mendoza. Its literally in great walking distance to Av. Villanueva Aristides. Where there are several restaurants and bars with amazing food and service. Literally it was busy every day we were there. On Friends Day it was packed :)

The Wine Tour - We went to the Amporo Tours, I might have misspelled it, but literally it was fantastic. The vineyards were all in the Uco Valley which had fantastic wines, food, and views of the Andes. Literally one of the most epic things I have done in Argentina. 

It was hard to leave....
Geraldine is an amazing hostess who goes the extra mile. The loft is in a good location and has all the amenities you need.

Geraldine was very kind and welcoming. The apartment was lovely, clean, well-maintained and everything was in excellent conditions. Geraldine was always available to talk whenever I had doubts about places around the apartment or when I wanted to know where to visit. My boyfriend and I had a great time there. Thank you for everything, Geraldine!

First of all, we'd like to thank Geraldine for understanding the problems we had with the flights (due to a strike in Argentinian airports) and letting us check in and out onde day later. We've apreciated so much! In addiction, she was a perfect hostess and made us feel like home since the very first moment. The loft location is great and you can do everything by foot. It was also very clean, organized and lovely decorated. Totally recomend it!
Geraldine was so kind and helpful in providing advice on what to do in Mendoza. We loved our loft, it is so conveniently located.

What a wonderful time staying in her apartment 
Let's start with the important stuff :
Location : located on a vey leafy street and dead center of Mendoza city   10 minute lovely stroll to Calle Villanueva with a plethora of cafes , bars, shops and restaurants. 14 minute walk to Plaza Independencia  ( center of town) 15 minute walk to the absolutely beautiful Parque San Martin   
Little markets just around the corner to stock up on supplies. 

Apartment: Perfect and absolutely like the pictures. She has a great heater Incase it's cold like when I was there. 
The bed is uber comfortable I was in heaven. 
The bedroom is located up a tiny stairs that has a beautiful view of the roof tops and courtyards of your neighbors. Nice sun. 
The living room is spacious and perfect after coming in from a long day of walking to just relax. 
Full kitchen well stocked with coffee and fruits.  
Washing machine was godsend especially since I needed to wash 2 weeks worth of clothing. 
Bathroom perfect with nice hot water and pressure in the shower. And with all the amenities you need like most important for me was her hair dryer.  
If you are tired and just want to stay at the apartment , her tv in your bedroom has ankitnofnawesome American tg Chanel's with movies and shows in English so that was nice 

Host: Getaldine made my stay in Mendoza   If it wasn't for her , I honestly don't think I would've had a good time. Besides my reserved tasting etc , she helped me plan my days , make very necessary reservations at different restaurants , hired cars to take me to spas and was always concerned that me as a solo traveler was well taken cared of and safe. She was so wonderful and I only wish more Airbnb hosts would take a page outbid her book on how to be a wonderfully welcoming landlord and host. I felt like she was my dear friend.  She really cared and it made all the difference with my stay. Thank you so much again headline. When back in Mendoza I'll be staying at your flat in a heart beat
reviews.response:
Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a wonderful and detailed review! 
I'm very grateful! I'm glad you enjoyed your stay. You are always welcome!

reviews.comments: We loved our stay in Mendoza, and Geraldine's loft was perfect! It's such a lovely space with everything you could want, including a much appreciated washing machine! The location was great, about 15-20 mins walk to the centre and restaurants. Although we didn't get to meet Geraldine, she was a great host - she was able to get us the keys when we arrived very early in Mendoza, and let us stay late In the apartment the day we left which was hugely appreciated. She even booked a remise for us! Great stay, would happily return here if we ever make it back to Mendoza.

Incredible loft with ultra comfy bed in a quiet leafy part of the city. Everything you need is close and the loft is perfect to come home to after a day's visit to the vineyards. A few blocks away you have a great shopping and restaurant strip and with Geraldine's insider tips we ate our way around Mendoza. The loft is a calming and relaxing place that I highly recommend.

Brilliant!!! If you are coming to Mendoza definitely stay in Geraldine's loft. It is a lovely space and within working distance of the city centre. You could not get a better host than Geraldine. Her advice on vine tours and restaurants was fabulous. Nothing was too much trouble, including organizing a taxi to the airport for us. A lovely bottle of Malbec and fruit when we arrived.
Geraldine is a wonderfully helpful host with a nice apartment in a great location in Mendoza. We loved our stay there and would return.

We had a nice time staying at Geraldine's apartment. It is relatively close by a big park, supermarket, and a main street with several bars and restaurants. She and her husband are very nice and genuine people and really want their guests to have a good experience visiting Mendoza.
